ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set captures concepts related to generic drugs for pneumonitis medications.),(Data Element Scope: This value set would use the Medication QDM category.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set contains human, prescribable generic drugs for infliximab, immunoglobulin G, mycophenolate, or mofetil.),(Exclusion Criteria: Brand name drugs and those not prescribable for humans have been excluded from this value set.)
